step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance. Ensure your shoulders are relaxed.
Excellent! Open your palm and fingers wide, really stretching them out.
Great job opening your hand wide. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. Visualize the lymph flow.
Second rep, looking good! Maintain that straight arm overhead and relaxed shoulders.
Perfectly executed! Keep those fingers spread wide as instructed.
Nicely done opening your hand. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles fully.
Fantastic! You're making a strong fist and inhaling. Keep up the great visualization.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and open your hand wide, then make a tight fist while inhaling. This helps promote lymph flow effectively. Keep practicing this motion.
